org.svvrl.goal.core.draw

Class Curve

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.draw.Curve

  • public class Curve
extends java.lang.Object
    A Curve is a visual component for transitions. It draws a transition as a QuadCurve2D object.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

    • Constructor Detail

      • Curve

        public Curve(boolean self,
             double x1,
             double y1,
             double cx,
             double cy,
             double x2,
             double y2)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        self - indicating if this curve is a self-loop
        x1 - the x coordinate of the starting point of this curve
        y1 - the y coordinate of the starting point of this curve
        cx - the x coordinate of the middle point of this curve
        cy - the y coordinate of the middle point of this curve
        x2 - the x coordinate of the ending point of this curve
        y2 - the y coordinate of the ending point of this curve

        public double getLabelYOffset(int ascent)
        Returns the Y offset of the curve label. The Y offset is relative to the line orthogonal to the curve label.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the Y offset of the curve label

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
        Draws this curve with a Graphics2D object. The label and arrow are also drawn.
        Parameters:
        g - a Graphics2D object used to draw this curve
